Body:
Description: we need to enable automatic SSL certificate renewal directly from the Cososys Endpoint Protector console. Currently, we have to manually upload the certificate into the Cososys console every three months and then handle the certificate renewal process.

Our CTO has expressed dissatisfaction with this setup and suggested seeking a refund. This has become a release blocker for us. Kindly take the necessary steps to address this issue at the earliest.
What We've Learned Updated: let the customer know automatic SSL renewal is not possible
Next Steps Updated: waiting on the customer
